name: KilosecondClock
0:
”Alexa, ask Kilosecond Clock what the time is.”
”Alexa, ask Kilosecond Clock what 9 o'clock is in kiloseconds.”
”Alexa, ask Kilosecond Clock what forty three kiloseconds is.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kilosecond clock
des:
Kiloseconds are a new way to tell time! Instead of there being 60 seconds to a minute and 60 seconds to an hour, there are just 1000 seconds to a kilosecond; easy!

Kilosecond clock is a skill that can help you tell the time in kiloseconds and convert between kiloseconds and regular time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
